quest.name: An Adaptive Tool
journal:
Chora-Zoi is eager to continue improving the splendorous tools.
※Changing classes or jobs will prevent progress during this quest.

Chora-Zoi looks to Grenoldt for guidance in the next stage of your splendorous undertaking, but he turns the question back on the young artisan. Unable to choose from the swarm of ideas in her head, she realizes that you, the tool's wielder, may be able to provide the clearest direction for the augmentations. Your answer encourages her to make use of an adaptive substance similar to dark matter, the acquisition of which once more entails the preparation of quality trade goods.

※Please note that you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

Thanks to Grenoldt's dream-inspired oil, the infusion of adaptive materials has successfully enhanced the splendorous tool even further. Chora–Zoi invites you to continue the collaboration as they strive towards Mowen's imagined future─one where Norvrandt is shaped for the better by the loving hands of its artisans.
objectives: With Augmented Splendorous SawAugmented Splendorous Cross-pein HammerAugmented Splendorous Raising HammerAugmented Splendorous MalletAugmented Splendorous KnifeAugmented Splendorous NeedleAugmented Splendorous AlembicAugmented Splendorous FrypanAugmented Splendorous PickaxeAugmented Splendorous HatchetAugmented Splendorous Fishing Rod in your inventory or Armoury Chest, deliver 90 Adaptive Carpenter's Component90 Adaptive Blacksmith's Component90 Adaptive Armorer's Component90 Adaptive Goldsmith's Component90 Adaptive Leatherworker's Component90 Adaptive Weaver's Component90 Adaptive Alchemist's Component90 Adaptive Culinarian's Component210 Adaptive Miner's Component and 210 Adaptive Botanist's Component and 80 Adaptive Fishing Rod Component and 210 Adaptive Fire Crystal210 Adaptive Lightning Crystal80 Adaptive Fishing Reel Component to Chora-Zoi.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note that upon completing the quest “An Adaptive Tool,” you will receive an upgraded splendorous tool for your current class of [Job].

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Undertake this quest as another class.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Undertake this quest as an [Job]a [Job].

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Be advised that once you have undertaken this quest, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted it.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please ensure that you have changed to your desired class before speaking with Chora-Zoi.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to receive the quest “An Adaptive Tool,” you must have [Error] equipped or in your inventory.
You have already received [Error]. Please change to a different class and speak with Chora-Zoi again.

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: Forename! How are you finding the augmented tool? Master Grenoldt's design was genius, and I can hardly wait to move on to the next stage!

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: Where do we stand, sir? Have we decided on a new improvement?

dialogue.name: GRENOLDT
dialogue.text: Actually, I'm interested in hearin' yer ideas.

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: Well, as I said before, originality isn't my forte. I'm fine when I have a plan to follow, but... <sigh>

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: It's not that I don't have any ideas, you understand─the problem is that I have too many. My head becomes a confused jumble and I can't decide which one I should choose.

dialogue.name: GRENOLDT
dialogue.text: That's just proof o' yer growth as an artisan. If ye've learned so many techniques that ye can't pick a direction for yer piece, then maybe ye need to ask the opinion o' the bugger what's been wieldin' it.

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: Of course... It's so obvious! What better way to end up with the perfect tradesperson's tool than by molding it to the needs and desires of our veteran tradeswomantradesman!

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: A coin for your thoughts, Forename. You were using the tool to prepare all those trade goods─what kind of improvement would you wish for?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: To have the tool respond to my slightest intention.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: I just want a tool that can read my mind.

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: So, you wish for the tool to be more...responsive?

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: A tool that...reads your mind!?

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: Hmmm. There are materials like dark matter which have adaptive properties─some have even been known to react to a person's thoughts and emotions.

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: If we could lay our hands on a high-quality substance like that, and succeed in bonding it to the grip... Then we may very well realize the artisan-attuned instrument I always dreamed of crafting!

dialogue.name: GRENOLDT
dialogue.text: Aye, that's the kind of answer I was lookin' for. Now that we've got a clearer picture o' where we're headin', I can make the adjustments to me designs.

dialogue.name: GRENOLDT
dialogue.text: Still, a high-purity material what acts like dark matter is not an easy ask─even for the likes o' Boutique procurers. We'll have to offer summat of equally high value in exchange...

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: Looking to improve another splendorous tool? It would be my pleasure! I hope you're not tired of preparing all these trade goods, though!

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: Let's see here... For the enhancements, I'd say we'll need a sizable stack of [Error].

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: Which means I'll have to ask you to come up with a similar number of [Error] to offer in barter.

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: Let's see here... For the enhancements, I'd say we'll need a sizable stack of [Error] and [Error].

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: Which means I'll have to ask you to come up with a similar number of [Error] to offer in barter.

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: Let's see here... For the enhancements, I'd say we'll need a sizable stack of [Error] and [Error].

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: Which means I'll have to ask you to come up with a similar number of [Error] and [Error] to offer in barter.

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: Components aside, everything is the same as before! In other words, please use the splendorous tool to prepare your wares, then deliver them directly to Quinnana.

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: I'm sure Master Grenoldt will remind you of what needs to be done should you happen to lose track!

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: And I'll be here waiting for the materials, eager to race to the forge as soon as all is in readiness!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Present Chora-Zoi with your splendorous tool and the requisite materials to receive an upgraded version.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Adaptive components can be obtained by delivering selected trade goods to Quinnana at Grenoldt's workbench near the Crystalline Mean.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To craft the necessary trade goods, open the Crafting Log, followed by Special Recipes from within the requisite crafting discipline. Next, select Sidequests, then lastly Splendorous Tools to locate applicable recipes.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note that select crafting materials can be purchased with scrips, and that you must have your splendorous tool equipped when crafting.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The trade goods in question can be found in the Splendorous Tools section of the Gathering Log.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note that you must have your splendorous tool equipped when gathering.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Catching fish suitable for use as trade goods requires the use of specialized bait balls. This bait can be obtained from Quinnana in exchange for scrips.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, please note that you must have your splendorous tool equipped when fishing.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: When making your final delivery to Chora-Zoi, the tool to be upgraded should be placed in your inventory or Armoury Chest, and not equipped.

dialogue.name: GRENOLDT
dialogue.text: Summat confusin' ye? Just make sure to use the splendorous tool to prepare the trade goods for barter.

dialogue.name: GRENOLDT
dialogue.text: Deliver said goods to Quinnana, an' she'll exchange them for the rare materials we need. Once ye've got enough, drop the lot on Chora-Zoi so's she can get on with the improvements. Simple, eh?

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: I see you've come through for us again, Forename!

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: With such a bounty of expensive materials at stake, I might be even more nervous than last time. I hope this stuff doesn't react to my emotions!

dialogue.name: GRENOLDT
dialogue.text: A “psychosensitive substance,” the scholars call it. It'll be me first time havin' summat o' this purity put to use in a craftin' design, so I'm pretty bloody curious to see how it turns out.

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: Right. We have the tool, the materials, and─fate willing─the talent. Bide here a while, and we'll be back with an even more splendid masterpiece!

dialogue.name: GRENOLDT
dialogue.text: (-Grenoldt-)Stand back! Here comes the finishing touch!!!

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: We did it! The splendorous tool has evolved once more!

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: I really must ask, though, Master Grenoldt... What was that divine liquid with which you so reverently anointed our work?

dialogue.name: GRENOLDT
dialogue.text: Oho... Well that, me young disciple, is the distilled essence o' me craftsmanship! A finishin' coat of oil what contains not one drop of impurity!

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: The perfect way to seal the tool's surface!

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: And this is the perfect time for you to show it off, Forename. Let's see how it looks!

dialogue.name: GRENOLDT
dialogue.text: Aye, now that's some fine craftsmanship. An' it seems right comfortable there in yer hand, like ye was born to hold it!

dialogue.name: GRENOLDT
dialogue.text: Chora-Zoi, I'd say ye've made yer wish come true─a tool what adapts itself to its wielder. I'm proud to be yer mentor.

dialogue.name: GRENOLDT
dialogue.text: As for you, Forename, I hope ye enjoy the new improvements. The tool should pick up on yer passion for the trade, an' from time to time ye'll find it amplifies yer mastery.

dialogue.name: GRENOLDT
dialogue.text: Just a little bonus from usin' “psychosensitive” materials...an' how the effect manifests through me finishin' oil.

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: And here I thought it was just a protective layer... Where does the inspiration for such revolutionary ideas come from?

dialogue.name: GRENOLDT
dialogue.text: From a bloody odd dream, in this case. I saw myself toiling over an anvil─naught too strange there─but I was bald as a boulder.

dialogue.name: GRENOLDT
dialogue.text: Then some beefy gentleman strides in an' douses me whole body in oil! The shock of it must've knocked me out o' bed, 'cause I woke up on the floor. That's when it dawned on me to coat our tool in the same way.

dialogue.name: MOWEN
dialogue.text: Greetings, my hardworking friends. Quinnana reports that your tool crafting is proceeding apace! Judging by the general mood here, might I assume you've had some success?

dialogue.name: MOWEN
dialogue.text: Most excellent news. I should like naught more than to continue this fruitful alliance, and stimulate the growth of industry with your wondrous creations.

dialogue.name: GRENOLDT
dialogue.text: Aye, things are already changin'. Until recent times, the art o' craftin' an' tradin' was just a means to stave off the fall o' society for one more day, but that age is comin' to an end.

dialogue.name: GRENOLDT
dialogue.text: Now's our chance to build a richer an' better world─together!

dialogue.name: MOWEN
dialogue.text: You and I...together!?

dialogue.name: GRENOLDT
dialogue.text: I... You... I meant the Boutique! An' Chora-Zoi! An' the Warrior o' Darkness! All of us, in a general sense!

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: Cheers to that! Shall we stop by the Wandering Stairs and raise a glass in celebration?

dialogue.name: GRENOLDT
dialogue.text: Ah, I appreciate the invitation, lass, but no brew ever passes these lips. I'd prefer to linger here a while─ye know, go over me designs an' make plans for future adjustments.

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: No rest for the master craftsman!

dialogue.name: MOWEN
dialogue.text: Hee hee! Even after ten years, some things never change.

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: Thank you, Forename. Working with you and Master Grenoldt has helped hone my artisan skills in so many ways. But I've also come to realize how much room there is for improvement─both for me, and for our splendorous tools.

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: Will you stay with us as we strive for perfection? As Mistress Mowen says, our craft will shape the world, and it would be a poorer one without you!

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: We've done it again! Hold up your [Error] and bathe in its new radiance!

dialogue.name: CHORAZOI
dialogue.text: Yes! It's as if it were an extension of your very arm! To craft such tools is every artisan's dream... Thank you again, Forename!
